newsitem.title: USA: Samsung Electronics extends tender offer.
newsitem.headline: Samsung Electronics extends tender offer.

text.p: Samsung Electronics Co Ltd said Wednesday 27,891,897 shares of AST Research Inc had been tendered as of July 1, and it is extending until July 21 its cash tender offer for all outstanding shares of the company.
The 27,891,897 shares tendered represents 88 percent of the outstanding shares not owned by Samsung.
Samsung said its tender offer was $5.40 a share.
The company said the offer is being extended to allow more time for the receipt of required approvals by the government of the Republic of Korea. All other government approvals have been obtained.
The company said it believes it has provided all information required by the Korean government, and it has no reason to believe the required approvals will not be obtained.
